info.title: Calendly
info.description: Calendly helps you schedule meetings without the back-and-forth emails

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Indicates if the invitee "canceled" or still "active"

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Order results by the **created_at** field and direction specified: ascending ("asc") or descending ("desc")

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

collection.description: The set of event invitees matching the criteria

get.description: Returns a list of Invitees for an event.
Returns a list of a event host’s (publisher) Events.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Return events that are scheduled with the user associated with this URI

parameters.name: invitee_email
parameters.description: Return events that are scheduled with the user associated with this email address

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Whether the scheduled event is `active` or `canceled`

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Order results by the specified field and direction. Accepts comma-separated list of {field}:{direction} values.
Supported fields are: start_time.
Sort direction is specified as: asc, desc.

parameters.name: min_start_time
parameters.description: Include events with start times after to this time (sample time me format: "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

parameters.name: max_start_time
parameters.description: Include events with start times prior to this time (sample time me format: "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

collection.description: The set of scheduled events matching the criteria

get.description: Returns all Event Types associated with a specified User.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: View available personal, team, and organization event types associated with the user's URI.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Order results by the specified field and direction. Accepts comma-separated list of {field}:{direction} values.
Supported fields are: name.
Sort direction is specified as: asc, desc.

withOmittedDirection.summary: Omit direction with fallback to asc by default

count.description: The number of rows to return

next_page.description: Return the next page of an ordered list ("null" indicates no additional results are available)

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: User unique identifier, or the constant "me" to reference the caller

Returns basic information about your user account.

get.description: Returns a list of Organization Invitations that were sent to the organization's members.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Order results by the field name and direction specified (ascending or descending). Returns multiple sets of results in a comma-separated list.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by status  ("pending", "accepted", or "declined")

uri.description: Canonical reference (unique identifier) for the organization invitation

organization.description: Canonical reference (unique identifier) for the organization

email.description: The email address of the person who was invited to join the organization

status.description: The status of the invitation ("pending", "accepted", or "declined")

created_at.description: The moment the invitation was created (e.g. “2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

updated_at.description: The moment the invitation was last updated (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

last_sent_at.description: The moment the invitation was last sent (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

user.description: If the invitation was sent by a user, this is the unique reference to that user

value.title: Invalid Email
value.message: invalid_email@example is an invalid email format

value.title: Already Organization Member
value.message: email@example.com is already in the organization

value.title: Please Upgrade Your Account to Send More Invitations
value.message: You already sent all the invitations you’re allotted based upon the number of seats purchased with your account. Please purchase more seats to send more invitations.

value.title: Please Upgrade Your Account to Send More Invitations
value.message: You already sent all the invitations allotted to you with a trial account.

value.title: Race Condition
value.message: A race condition occurred when processing the request.  Please try the request again.

post.description: Invites a user to an organization.

email.description: The email of the user being invited

parameters.name: org_uuid
parameters.description: The organization’s unique identifier

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The organization invitation's unique identifier

value.title: Invitation Already Accepted
value.message: The invitation has already been accepted.

delete.description: Use this to revoke an Organization Invitation to an organization. Once revoked, the invitation link that was sent to the invitee is no longer valid.

get.description: Returns an Organization Invitation that was sent to the organization's members.

403.description: Caller not authorized to perform this action

value.title: Permission Denied
value.message: This user is not in your organization

get.description: Returns information about a user's Organization Membership

403.description: Caller not authorized to perform this action

value.message: You can not change owner role

value.title: Permission Denied
value.message: You can not remove yourself from organization

value.title: Permission Denied
value.message: You cannot modify members from another organization

delete.description:
Removes a user from an organization.

Notes:

* To remove users, the caller must have admin rights for the organization

* An organization owner can’t be removed

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The organization membership's unique identifier

parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by organization

parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by user

403.description: Caller not authorized to perform this action

value.title: Permission Denied
value.message: This user is not in your organization

get.description:
Use this to list the Organization Memberships for all users belonging to an organization, use:

* `user` to look up a user's membership in an organization

* `organization` to look up all users that belong to the organization

This endpoint can also be used to retrieve your organization uuid.

uri.description: Canonical reference (unique identifier) for the webhook

callback_url.description: The callback URL to use when the event is triggered

created_at.description: The moment when the webhook subscription was created (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

updated_at.description: The moment when the webhook subscription was last updated (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

retry_started_at.description: The date and time the webhook subscription is retried

state.description: Indicates if the webhook subscription is "active" or "disabled"

events.description: A list of events to which the webhook is subscribed

scope.description: The scope of the webhook subscription

organization.description: The URI of the organization that's associated with the webhook subscription

user.description: The URI of the user that's associated with the webhook subscription

creator.description: The URI of the user who created the webhook subscription

409.description: Attempt to create a resource that already exists

value.title: Already Exists
value.message: Hook with this url already exists

enum: Hook with this url already exists

post.description: Create a Webhook Subscription for an Organization or User.

url.description: Canonical reference (unique identifier) for the resource

events.description: List of user events to subscribe to.

organization.description: The unique reference to the organization that the webhook will be tied to.

user.description: The unique reference to the user that the webhook will be tied to.

scope.description: Indicates if the webhook subscription scope will be "organization" or "user"

get.description: Get a list of Webhook Subscriptions for an Organization or User with a UUID.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by organization

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by user. This parameter is only required if the `scope` parameter is set to `user`.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Order results by the specified field and direction. Accepts comma-separated list of {field}:{direction} values.
Supported fields are: created_at.
Sort direction is specified as: asc, desc.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Filter the list by organization or user

get.description: Get a Webhook Subscription for an Organization or User with a specified UUID.

delete.description: Delete a Webhook Subscription for an Organization or User with a specified UUID.

uri.description: Canonical reference (unique identifier) for the user

slug.description: The portion of URL for the user's scheduling page (where invitees book sessions), rendered in a human-readable format

scheduling_url.description: The URL of the user's Calendly landing page (that lists all the user's event types)

timezone.description: The time zone offset to use when presenting time to the user

avatar_url.description: The URL of the user's avatar (image)

created_at.description: The moment when the user's record was created (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

updated_at.description: The moment when the user's record was last updated (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

uri.description: Canonical reference (unique identifier) for the resource

status.description: Indicates if the event is "active" or "canceled"

start_time.description: The moment the event was scheduled to start (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

end_time.description: The moment the event was scheduled to end (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

event_type.description: The event type associated with this event

total.description: Total invitees for an event, including invitees that have canceled

active.description: Total invitees for an event that have not canceled

limit.description: Maximum number of active invitees that can book the event

created_at.description: The moment when the event was created (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

updated_at.description: The moment when the event was last updated (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

Location.description: The polymorphic base type for an event location that Calendly supports
Location.title: Location

InPersonMeeting.description: Information about the physical (in-person) event location
InPersonMeeting.title: In-Person Meeting

type.description: Indicates that the event host (publisher) will call the invitee

location.description: The physical location specified by the event host (publisher)

OutboundCall.description: Meeting publisher will call the Invitee
OutboundCall.title: Outbound Call

type.description: Indicates that the event host (publisher) will call the invitee

location.description: The phone number the event host (publisher) will use to call the invitee

InboundCall.description: Invitee will call meeting publisher at the specified phone number
InboundCall.title: Inbound Call

type.description: Indicates that the invitee will call the event host

location.description: The phone number the invitee will use to call the event host (publisher)

GoogleConference.description: Details about an Event that will take place using a Google Meet / Hangout conference
GoogleConference.title: Google Conference

type.description: The event location is a Google Meet or Hangouts conference

status.description: Indicates the current status of the Google conference

ZoomConference.description: Meeting will take place in a Zoom conference
ZoomConference.title: Zoom Conference

type.description: The event location is a Zoom conference

status.description: Indicates the current status of the Zoom conference

data.description: The conference metadata supplied by Zoom

id.description: The conference ID provided by Zoom

MicrosoftTeamsConference.description: Meeting will take place in a Microsoft Teams conference
MicrosoftTeamsConference.title: Microsoft Teams Conference

type.description: The event location is a Zoom conference

status.description: Indicates the current status of the Microsoft Teams conference

data.description: The conference metadata supplied by Microsoft Teams

id.description: The conference ID provided by Microsoft Teams

GotoMeetingConference.description: Details about an Event that will take place using a GotoMeeting conference
GotoMeetingConference.title: GoToMeeting Conference

type.description: The event location is a GoToMeeting conference

status.description: Indicates the current status of the GoToMeeting conference

data.description: The conference metadata supplied by GoToMeeting

uniqueMeetingId.description: Canonical reference (unique identifier) for the GoToMeeting conference

CustomLocation.description: Use this to describe an existing Calendly-supported event location.
CustomLocation.title: Custom Location

type.description: The event location doesn't fall into a standard category defined by the event host (publisher)

location.description: The location description provided by the event host (publisher)

InviteeSpecifiedLocation.description: Information about an event location that’s specified by the invitee.
InviteeSpecifiedLocation.title: Invitee Specified Location

type.description: The event location selected by the invitee

location.description: The event location description provided by the invitee

uri.description: Canonical reference (unique identifier) for the event type

name.description: The event type name (in human-readable format)

active.description: Indicates if the event is active or not.

slug.description: The portion of the event type's URL that identifies a specific web page (in a human-readable format)

scheduling_url.description: The URL of the user’s scheduling site where invitees book this event type

duration.description: The length of sessions booked with this event type

kind.description: Indicates if the event type is "solo" (belongs to an individual user) or "group"

pooling_type.description: Indicates if the event type is "round robin" (alternates between hosts) or "collective" (invitees pick a time when all participants are available) or "null" (the event type doesn’t consider the availability of a group participants)

type.description: Indicates if the event type is "AdhocEventType" (ad hoc event) or "StandardEventType" (standard event type)

color.description: The hexadecimal color value of the event type's scheduling page

created_at.description: The moment the event type was created (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

updated_at.description: The moment the event type was last updated (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

internal_note.description: Contents of a note that may be associated with the event type

description_plain.description: The event type's description (in non formatted text)

description_html.description: The event type's description (formatted with HTML)

Profile.description: The profile of the User that's associated with the Event Type (note: some event types don't have user profiles)
Profile.title: Profile

type.description: Indicates if the profile belongs to a "user" (individual) or "team"

name.description: Human-readable name for the profile of the user that's associated with the event type

owner.description: The unique reference to the user associated with the profile

Invitee.description: An individual who has been invited to meet with a Calendly member
Invitee.title: Invitee

uri.description: Canonical reference (unique identifier) for the invitee

status.description: Indicates if the event is "active" or "canceled"

questions_and_answers.description: A collection of the invitee's responses to questions on the event booking confirmation form

timezone.description: Time zone offset (from UTC) to use when displaying time  to the invitee

created_at.description: The moment when the event was created (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

updated_at.description: The moment when the event was last updated (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

text_reminder_number.description: The phone number to use when sending text (SMS) reminders

rescheduled.description: Indicates if this invitee has rescheduled. If `true`, a reference to the new Invitee instance is provided in the `new_invitee` field.

old_invitee.description: Reference to old Invitee instance that got rescheduled

new_invitee.description: Link to new invitee, after reschedule

uri.description: Canonical reference (unique identifier) for the membership

role.description: The user's role in the organization

organization.description: A unique reference to the organization

updated_at.description: The moment when the membership record was last updated (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

created_at.description: The moment when the membership record was created (e.g. "2020-01-02T03:04:05.678Z")

InviteeQuestionAndAnswer.title: Invitee Question and Answer
InviteeQuestionAndAnswer.description: A response to a question on a booking page form

question.description: A question on the invitee's booking form

answer.description: The invitee's answer to the question

position.description: The position of the question in relation to others on the booking form

InviteeTracking.title: Invitee Tracking
InviteeTracking.description: The UTM and Salesforce tracking parameters associated with an Invitee

utm_campaign.description: The UTM parameter used to track a campaign

utm_source.description: The UTM parameter that identifies the source (platform where the traffic originates)

utm_medium.description: The UTM parameter that identifies the type of input (e.g. Cost Per Click (CPC), social media, affiliate or QR code)

utm_term.description: The UTM parameter used to track keywords
